mainMenu.title: Main Menu:
mainMenu.reportBugDesc: Submit an issue report on GitHub
mainMenu.quitDesc: Exit settings (with save prompt if needed)
mainMenu.updatePackageDesc: [DE] Update the i18n-toolkit package via npm
mainMenu.saveChangesBeforeQuit: [DE] Do you want to save changes before quitting? (y/N):
mainMenu.goodbyeMessage: [DE] Thank you for using the i18n settings manager!
mainMenu.selectSettingPrompt: [DE] Select a setting to edit (or 'b' to go back):

theme.label: Color Theme
theme.help: Choose between light and dark themes

dateFormat.label: Date Format
dateFormat.help: Choose how dates are displayed in reports

enabled.label: Enable Notifications
enabled.help: Enable desktop notifications for completed operations

sourceDir.label: Source Directory
sourceDir.help: Path to directory with source translation files

sourceLanguage.label: Source Language
sourceLanguage.help: The primary language used as source for translations

outputDir.label: Output Directory
outputDir.help: Where reports and processed files will be saved

batchSize.label: Batch Size
batchSize.description: Number of items processed per batch
batchSize.help: How many files to process in each batch

maxConcurrentFiles.label: Max Concurrent Files
maxConcurrentFiles.help: Maximum number of files to process at the same time

sizingThreshold.label: Sizing Threshold (%)
sizingThreshold.help: Percentage threshold for detecting size mismatches

strictMode.label: Strict Validation Mode
strictMode.help: Enable strict validation for translation files

enableAuditLog.label: Enable Audit Log
enableAuditLog.help: Log all changes made to translation files

backupBeforeChanges.label: Auto Backup
backupBeforeChanges.help: Automatically create backups before making changes

actions.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to defaults? (y/N):

help.title: Settings Help
help.navigation: Use number keys to select options, 'b' to go back
help.editing: Enter new values when prompted, or press Enter to keep current
help.saving: Use 's' to save changes before quitting
help.reset: Use option 7 to reset all settings to defaults
